p: Dr. George Katt has joined the company of saints and become a eunuch! The sacred ceremony was performed and the sacrificial knife wielded by the Rev. Mr. Miser._ You will remember that the Doctor refused to run for the Presidency, even on the platform of a 21-egg week, on the grounds that he was too tired to run. As he will now be less tired, it is probably that he may choose to run in 1944.
Damned plutocrats you are, and I'll bet you've gone Wedelling! Huh! Country home, and all that! Snobs! High noses! Mama is a Wilkie man, but I'm voting
for Geo. Washington and the Lincoln, until Dr. Katt feels able to run.
Those were lovely letters. It make us glow inside to think of you two happy together.
